4、📌Interactive contract risk identification
5、📌Malicious signature risk identification

7、📌AI semantic signature content output
8、📌Wallet risk monitoring
9、📌Visualized transaction flow graph tracing
10、📌Complete asset tracing report generation
11、..................................
